nio/ESFind.Description: Finds elements from given search parameters

Output.Description: Data satisfying find criteria as 'Signal' instances.

offset.description: Starting offset to use when returning data

nio/ESBase.Description:
Provides base class for elasticsearch blocks.
Each block defines a query to be executed. If that query fails then one retry will be attempted after first waiting one second. Only if this retry fails will the block log an error.

connected.description: determines if elasticsearch server is available

search.description: performs a search for given 'body' and 'params' parameters

elasticsearch_client_kwargs.description: kwargs to be passed to elasticsearch client.

Input.Description: One document will be inserted into the database for each input signal.

nio/ESInsert.Description: Stores input signals in a elasticsearch database. One document will be inserted into the database for each input signal.

Output.Description: A signal with "id" field obtained from inserted document

with_type.description: If True, includes the signal type in the document.

Exclude Existing.description: Whether or not to exclude existing data. If this is checked, a new signal will be notified for every incoming signal. In other words, no data from the incoming signal will be included on the notified signal.

Results Field.description: The attribute on the signal to store the results from this block. If this is empty, the results will be merged onto the incoming signal. This is the default operation. Having this field allows a block to "save" the results of an operation to a single field on an incoming signal and notify the enriched signal.
